DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric and alphabetic characters used as identification for a normal tissue sample.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm. (NCI)_The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.

Concepts.definition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ReferenceDocuments.name: TCGA CQCF Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Provide the TSS unique tumor ID.  If multiple pieces of tumor are submitted, each tumor needs a unique ID.
